## Data Format Guide

### Quick Start
Click **"Load Example Data"** to see a working dataset with pre-configured mappings.

### Expected Data Structure

**Raw Clinical Trial Data** (one row per visit):


subject_id | visit_date | visit_type          | tumor_response  |
-----------|------------|---------------------|-----------------|
PAT001     | 15/01/2023 | Cycle 1 Day 1       | NA              |
PAT001     | 18/02/2023 | Cycle 2 Assessment  | PR (Partial response)|
PAT001     | 15/05/2023 | End of Treatment    | NA|


### Required Columns
- **Patient ID** - Unique identifier  
- **Date** - Visit/assessment dates
- **Visit Type** - Event description (Baseline, Cycle X Assessment, End of Treatment)
- **Response** - Response values (CR, PR, SD, PD, or measurements)

### Supported Formats
- **Dates**: DD/MM/YYYY, YYYY-MM-DD, MM/DD/YYYY
- **Responses**: CR, PR, SD, PD, uPD, NE (or numeric values)
- **Files**: CSV, Excel (.xlsx, .xls)

### The App Will:
✅ Extract treatment start/end dates from visit types  
✅ Clean and standardize response values  
✅ Calculate treatment timelines and best responses
